Managing Director â€“ Investment Banking Co-Head of Technology & Telecommunications Group

Mr. Jansen joined Raymond James & Associates in 2001 after leading the communications and technology group at Wachovia Securities, Inc. (WSI). He previously served as head of mergers and acquisitions for WSI and Interstate/Johnson. Before joining WSI in 1996, Mr. Jansen worked with Citibankâ€™s mergers and acquisitions group in Frankfurt, Germany, where he specialized in cross-border transactions involving multinational companies based primarily in North America and Europe. He previously worked with Commerzbank AG both in Frankfurt and Los Angeles in mergers and acquisitions and corporate finance roles.

Mr. Jansen earned a Bachelor of Science with honors in business administration from the College of Charleston and a Master of Business Administration from Duke Universityâ€™s Fuqua School of Business, where he was named a Fuqua Scholar.

relationships.title: Managing Director, Co-Head of the Tech & Telecom Group
